name: Jelly Cat (martin_land)
description:
Play as a stuff toy cat, where you must collect the balloons to progress.

Move with W,A,S,D.  Spacebar to jump press again to double jump, press P to Pause, E to interact with some objects, like characters and ladder.  Press down arrow key to go down pipes.

When jumping or falling, press 1 to glide, press 1 again to stop gliding.

Right mouse to tail attack and L button to purr
